topic.title: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE INCOMPLETE REFERRALS (EXCEEDING 28 DAYS AT REPORTING PERIOD END STANDARD)
topic.shortdesc: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE INCOMPLETE REFERRALS (EXCEEDING 28 DAYS AT REPORTING PERIOD END STANDARD) is the number of NHS Continuing Healthcare (Standard) referrals waiting to be concluded, that have exceeded 28 days at the end of the REPORTING PERIOD.
